## [[Tags]]

```yaml
# .github/workflows/deploy.yml
name: ğŸ› ï¸ CI + ğŸš€ Deploy BirdsColor

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: ğŸ“¥ Clonar repositorio
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: ğŸ”§ Instalar Node y dependencias
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: 18

    - run: npm ci

    - name: âœ… Ejecutar pruebas unitarias
      run: npm test

    - name: ğŸš€ Publicar en GitHub Pages
      if: success()
      uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
      with:
        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        publish_dir: ./src

```
